name: Arlo the Rabbit - DEMO
description:
A young boy wakes up to find that his prized golden carrot has been stolen by the evil Vixanne.

Traverse through 5 worlds (but in the demo it's just 1), and retrieve your gold carrot!

This being a demo, there will be things that will be changed and tweaked. Keep that in mind!

DEMO UPDATED ON 4.20.2018. Closer to the final product.

RELEASE DATE: MAY 23RD 2018 ON STEAM FOR $3.
